column5: You deserve better than that, you need to focus on yourself
U/Justinkrehbiel
that's normal, no worries man
tie it back
I think that style looks great! Why change it?
I would say no facial hair until you can grow out the full beard
just learn how to slick back the sides and you'll be okay, im going through the awkward stage and I have to be in a suit for work, so I get it
I'm sorry he did that, if you need somebody to talk to, please message me, this community will help you get through this
this is exactly how I felt, just know that we all understand your pain, reach out to us if you need anything. :)
Yes, this is normal and will come as naturally. It’s a little scary but it will grow back and stay back
Where are you located?
You’ll have somebody to hold soon. I promise you that.
Hey, we are here for you! I’ll send a message
Will do
We all got you! Send messages if you need to talk
Send me a PM, let’s talk
I feel the exact same way you do, I can relate hard.
I am! In Florida
How do you even do voice chat on here?
Send me a message! I’d love to get to knew more people!
You might need to lower your standard a little bit
Sounds like somebody who id be best friends with :)
Awesome!’
You learn to meet other people that will make you feel safe, try dating websites. You don’t need to fall in love with the first person, but try to let others in your heart
I’ve been playing Fortnite with people. People are so fun online
Do not be so hard on yourself! There is a plan for you in this world!
I want you to know, I’m sitting in your shoes now. I just watch my ex go back to her abusing boyfriend and told me to leave her life forever.
Thank you, I appreciate that
Thank you for your kind words. I hope my future gets brighter and I make more connections.
I would talk to your father about this
Everything will be okay, just read the comments and other posts. It is what helped me. In this type of hour
